channel.title: Robo3D on Dustin Kopp
channel.description: Recent content in Robo3D on Dustin Kopp

item.title: Upgrading the printer
item.description: Upgrading the printer I have enjoyed my Robo3D R1+ since Christmas 2015. It works really well and I haven’t had too many issues with it, but I was born a tinkerer. E3D recently came out with a few interesting things, the Titan extruder and the v6 hot end with a little silicone sleeve to keep the block clean. Well I obviously need this. I was also made aware of a new controller board gaining some traction, the Duet WiFi.
